name: trending_feed_video_posts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool social_media_data_tt.
Tool description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.  -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
API description: Get current trending feed. 

- Due to nature of this endpoint the **max_cursor** is not required. Each request can return different data by default
- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

limit.description: The number of records to return in the response. Defaults to None, which returns up to 20 records.
